title: Cirrus intortus cloud
text:
Cirrus intortus is a variety of <a href="cirrus%20cloud">cirrus cloud</a>. The name "cirrus intortus" is derived from <a href="Latin">Latin</a>, meaning "twisted, wound". The variety of intortus clouds is specific to cirrus clouds, and they appear as interwound strands of cirrus clouds with a purely random pattern. The filaments are often curved in a very irregular pattern.
Like other <a href="cirrus%20cloud">cirrus cloud</a>s, cirrus intortus occur at high <a href="altitude">altitude</a>s.
